GK17jvrtmsau:320: nūṇaṃ sa gaṇḍūṣajalopayogān % mayā nipīto 'mbudhir ity aveti // JVms_139
GK17jvrtmsau:321: api tv aśeṣasmaravairiṇām apy $ ākhyeyatākhyātim anāśriteṣu &
GK17jvrtmsau:322: guṇeṣu te nātha vṛthābhimānasya- % ākhyānikāsau viparītapūrvā // JVms_140
GK17jvrtmsau:325: guṇasāgara sāgarair apūritāṅgurīgarto % viṣamaṃ daśāntare dayā
GK17jvrtmsau:328: laghuguruniyatibhṛti bhayam ayati ko na % bhavasi na yadi niyatam abhividhivacanam anu pīḍaḥ suciranihitahitamatikandāṅ- $ kura iva tava bhāti &
GK17jvrtmsau:331: prasaradurudahanaghanaghora- $ cchaṭam iva gaganatalam anavadhi dadhānā &
GK17jvrtmsau:332: prasabham abhimukhaṃ te % praśamayati śamanam api nayanavalanalavalīlā //
GK17jvrtmsau:333: mṛdujanam anu punar iyam eva $ praśamitasakalakaṭukaluṣaviṣarāśiḥ &
GK17jvrtmsau:334: pratimuhur abhinavam atulasukhanidhim upanayantī % niyatam amṛtadhāra //
GK17jvrtmsau:337: ghoraghanarasitam īśa tanuḥ % kṛpayā kuto 'pi jayatīyam udgatā // JVms_146
GK17jvrtmsau:339: hlādayaty akhilalokam idaṃ % paṭukīrtisaurabhakam adbhutaṃ tava //
GK17jvrtmsau:341: damayati tava bhuvanāni vapur % lalitaṃ ca kiṃ tu vikaṭaṃ yad īdṛśam //
GK17jvrtmsau:344: marud anatiśayarayaḥ % pracupitam api tava na sameti salīlam // JVms_149
GK17jvrtmsau:345: kiṃ bhūyo bhagavan bhavantam aśrayam āptaḥ $ sthitabhāram atulam ārṣabhaṃ
GK17jvrtmsau:347: tac chuddhavirāḍviśeṣaṇam hy % aparaviṣamaśirasi padaṃ vinidhatte //
GK17jvrtmsau:348: ārādhyeti bhavantam āśrayaikasamṛddhyā $ kuśalaṃ yad amalam asti vardhamānam &
GK17jvrtmsau:349: tat idam akhilam udañcatu bhuvanam urupadaṃ % tvadabhimatam ativividhavṛttaviśeṣaiḥ // JVms_151
GK17jvrtmsau:350: api ca pracayena bhūyasā $ kuśalasyāsya nikamanirmalasya &
GK17jvrtmsau:354: uḍupatiruciranicayamayam iva vapur % anatiśayakaruṇam iha vahad anubhavatu
GK17jvrtmsau:356: vicitravṛttair iti varṇanena $ yad ācitaṃ candrakarāmalaṃ śubham &
